content: can I use tape to hold together my robot?

No. In WRO Robomission 2025 rules, you may not use tape (or any non-LEGO fixing material) to hold pieces together. Only LEGO parts may be used to build and secure the robot. [Source: WRO Robomission Rules 2025, Section 3.1]

Official source: https://www.wro-association.org/en/rules/robomission-2025

If youâ€™re unsure, please double-check the current rulebook or ask your event organizer for confirmation.
